column4: ehm.. a basic question.. How do I "cd" into a directory that has spaces in name?
is it the same if I want to recover after installing gentoo??
And even then there are certain paramters can can be set when the kernel is compiled to allow more than 4gb.  The Ubuntu -server kernel has this support.
who do I need to contact in terms of channels? like so far #ubuntu-sk forwards to #ubuntu-cz and if I wanted the #ubuntu-sk channel
can you ask about it in #ubuntu-ops? I'm not sure what the policy is right now, and I'm a bit too busy to hunt it down
if its running, use: netstat -tanp | grep programname
You can look at the build logs for the packages.. let me get you a link, hold on.
thank you, this is what I need..
do you know if there is anything like that for medibuntu repositories?
